articles.title: Here’s how much money companies can save by using AI to replace human workers
articles.summary: Morgan Stanley did the math on how corporate adoption of artificial intelligence could affect businesses' bottom line—and the numbers are staggering.
articles.translated_title: Here’s how much money companies can save by using AI to replace human workers

articles.title: Elon Musk accuses of Apple and OpenAI of stifling AI competition in antitrust lawsuit
articles.summary: Elon Musk on Monday targeted Apple and OpenAI in an antitrust lawsuit alleging that the iPhone maker and the ChatGPT maker are teaming up to thwart competition in artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: Elon Musk accuses of Apple and OpenAI of stifling AI competition in antitrust lawsuit

articles.title: Musk sues OpenAI and Apple over anticompetitive conduct

articles.title: Elon Musk sues Apple, OpenAI in Texas over competition, App Store rankings
articles.summary: Elon Musk is accusing two tech giants of illegally conspiring to thwart competition for artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Google AI Search Tools Threaten Websites' Traffic
articles.summary: Financial Times reported that many website owners and publishers are concerned that Google's artificial intelligence search tools will lead to a dramatic decrease in traffic.
articles.translated_title: Google AI Search Tools Threaten Websites' Traffic
articles.translated_summary: Financial Times reported that many website owners and publishers are concerned that Google's artificial intelligence search tools will lead to a dramatic decrease in traffic.

articles.title: Elon Musk and xAI are suing Apple and OpenAI because Grok isn't topping the app charts
articles.summary: Elon Musk's xAI startup has sued Apple and OpenAI. The suit accuses the pair of conspiring to thwart competition for artificial intelligence platforms.
articles.translated_title: Elon Musk and xAI are suing Apple and OpenAI because Grok isn't topping the app charts
articles.translated_summary: Elon Musk's xAI startup has sued Apple and OpenAI. The suit accuses the pair of conspiring to thwart competition for artificial intelligence platforms.

articles.title: Elon Musk’s xAI Sues Apple Over Claims It Favors OpenAI
articles.summary: Mr. Musk’s artificial intelligence company, xAI, claimed that its Grok chatbot app was being artificially suppressed in Apple’s App Store.
articles.translated_title: Elon Musk’s xAI Sues Apple Over Claims It Favors OpenAI

articles.title: Elon Musk’s xAI sues Apple and OpenAI over AI competition, App Store rankings
articles.summary: Billionaire entrepreneur Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI sued Apple (AAPL) and ChatGPT maker OpenAI in U.S. federal court in Texas on Monday, accusing them of illegally conspiring to thwart competition for artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: Elon Musk’s xAI sues Apple and OpenAI over AI competition, App Store rankings
